name: SOLD Swing Tag Necklace
description: A materialistic expression of love and commitment. Featuring a monoline sans-serif font with a romantic old-meets-new aesthetic, this solid sterling silver SOLD swing tag has a clean, modern look with soft, feminine lines. Polished to perfection, the jewellery draws the eye to the refined design featuring your name or choice of word. Designed to be worn on a string, you will receive a generous length of silk cord. Tie it in a knot and wear it long, or keep it short and fasten with a simple bow on the back of your neck. Materials Sterling Silver 925 Hallmarked 30” Black Silk Cord Dimensions Variable Length 12mm Wide 1.8mm Thick Custom Orders This item superbly crafted and is designed and made-to-order especially for you - it is not stamped. Please allow 14-21 days before your order is shipped.

name: SMILE Bunting Necklace
description: Build your own bunting necklace with a collection of flags, or simply wear a heart or single initial. In the spirit of hand-making and personalisation I encourage you to try knotting your flags onto your own ribbons and cords. Each flag features a monoline sans-serif letter or symbol, with a romantic old-meets-new aesthetic. Each flag is made of highly polished solid sterling silver, and has a clean modern look. Your bunting will arrive on silk cord, spaced with knots if you order more than one. Tie it in a knot and wear it long, or keep it short and fasten with a simple bow on the back of your neck. Materials Sterling Silver 925 Hallmarked Yellow or Black Silk Cord Dimensions (Each Flag) 12mm Long 11mm Wide 3mm Thick The hole will accommodate cords up to 1mm thick.

Please allow 14-21 days before your order is shipped. Gifts for Children A personalised name necklace makes and excellent keepsake for Christenings and naming ceremonies, but please keep in mind that necklaces are not suitable for children under 3 years.

name: MRS monogram token
description: Have your own monogram or initials featured on this personalised pendant. A lovely gift for a bride or newlyweds. Featuring a monoline sans-serif font with a romantic old-meets-new aesthetic, this personalised pendant has the feel of a luxurious sterling silver coin. Polished to perfection, the jewellery draws the eye to the refined design featuring your monogram, initials or salutation. Designed to be worn on a string, you will receive a generous length of silk cord to thread through the token. Tie it in a knot and wear it long, or keep it short and fasten with a simple bow on the back of your neck.
